name: ChronicHeartFailureExacerbation
title: Chronic Heart Failure Exacerbation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to chronic heart failure exacerbation/acute on chronic heart failure.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes acute on chronic heart failure/acute exacerbation of chronic heart failure. It includes acute on chronic systolic/diastolic heart failure, acute on chronic heart failure with reduced/preserved ejection fraction, and both acute on chronic left- and right-sided heart failure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes acute, postprocedural, fetal, neonatal, obstetric related, and chronic heart failure without exacerbation. It also excludes heart failure staging terms (e.g., Congestive heart failure stage B).)

concept.display: Acute on chronic combined systolic and diastolic heart failure (disorder)

Reduced ejection fraction co-occurrent and due to acute on chronic heart failure (disorder)
Acute on chronic heart failure co-occurrent with normal ejection fraction (disorder)
